tool_description: Calculates priority scores for service requests based on SLA requirements, customer tier, urgency, and business impact factors.

request_id.description: Unique identifier for the service request

customer_tier.description: Customer service tier: premium, standard, basic

sla_response_hours.description: SLA required response time in hours

urgency_level.description: Request urgency: critical, high, medium, low

business_impact.description: Business impact level: severe, moderate, minor

error_messages: Invalid customer tier: Use one of [premium, standard, basic].
Invalid SLA hours: SLA response hours must be a positive number.
Invalid urgency level: Use one of [critical, high, medium, low].
Invalid business impact: Use one of [severe, moderate, minor].
Invalid equipment criticality: Use one of [mission-critical, important, routine].
Negative request age: Request age must be a non-negative number of hours.
usage: Provide request_id, customer_tier, and sla_response_hours as minimum parameters. Optionally specify urgency_level, business_impact, equipment_criticality, and request_age_hours for more accurate priority calculation.

priority_score.description: Calculated priority score (0-100, higher is more urgent)

priority_category.description: Priority category: emergency, urgent, normal, deferred

sla_risk_level.description: SLA breach risk: high, medium, low

recommended_response_time.description: Recommended response time in hours based on priority
